title: Welcome to the event discussion forum!

mainPost.author: Event Organizer
mainPost.content: This is the official discussion forum for our event. Feel free to ask questions or share your thoughts!

replies.author: John Doe
replies.content: I'm excited for this event! Can't wait to attend.

replies.author: Event Organizer
replies.content: We're excited to have you join us, John! Stay tuned for more updates.

mainPost.author: Jane Smith
mainPost.content: Is there parking available at the venue? If so, what are the costs?

title: Food and beverages at the event

mainPost.author: Mike Johnson
mainPost.content: Will there be food and drinks available for purchase at the event? Are outside food and drinks allowed?

replies.author: Event Organizer
replies.content: Yes, we'll have food vendors at the event. Outside food is allowed, but please no outside alcoholic beverages.
